title.rendered: Youth Euro Quiz 2024 at Czech Republic Embassy

content.rendered:
Smile Foundation’s Child For Child (CFC) program was featured at the Youth Euro Quiz 2024: Exploring Europe, hosted at the Czech Republic Embassy in New Delhi. The event, organized with the Polish Institute New Delhi and several European embassies, focused on European culture and history.

Teams from schools including JSS Public School, Noida; Guru Nanak Public School, Punjabi Bagh, St. Crispin’s Senior Secondary School, Gurugram; and Delhi International School Edge, Dwarka participated in the quiz. The event, hosted by Mr. Srinjoy Chowdhury, aimed to engage young participants in exploring European cultures and strengthening diplomatic connections.

The Child For Child (CFC) program by Smile Foundation connects privileged and underprivileged children through interactive sessions, promoting social responsibility and community awareness. It encourages participation in building a more inclusive society.
